Pre-Game Insights: USA and Canada are making their T20 World Cup debuts, with the match serving as the tournament opener.
The match is held at Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas, on June 1, 2024, at 7:30 p.m. ET.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tournament features 20 teams, the most in its history, and is held across nine venues in the West Indies and the United States.
Others: The article provides information on how to watch the match for free using services like Fubo and a free trial of Willow TV.
